name: Application Whitelisting with Applocker
description: This content pack leverages implementing an Application Whitelisting Approach.

summary.@value: This Dashboard aggregates all available information collected from Windows Endpoints regarding applications controlled by Applocker.

query.query_string: _exists_:appid AND NOT appname:SYSTEMTOOL AND NOT ((appbase:SYSTEM32 OR appbase:PROGRAMFILES OR appbase:WINDIR OR appbase:MICROSOFT OR appbase:WINDOWS OR appbase:MICROSOFTWINDOWS ) OR NOT (appaction:block)) AND NOT appcat:AUTHORIZE

description.@value: Microsoft provides Applocker as solution to enforce Application Whitelisting. This allows to fully control Applications and Scripts being executed on all Windows Systems being managed by Applocker. This Dashboard provides insights to proactively enabling all required applications as well as identifying attempts to run unauthorized executables.

source.@value:
pipeline "Windows - Applocker - Ingestion"
stage 20 match either
rule "Windows - Applocker - NXLog - Normalization 21"
rule "Windows - Applocker - Winlogbeat - Normalization 22"
stage 30 match either
rule "Windows - AppLocker - Parsing 33"
rule "Windows - AppLocker - Parsing 34"
rule "Windows - Applocker - Parsing 36"
rule "Windows - Applocker - Parsing 37"
rule "Windows - Applocker - Parsing 38"
stage 40 match either
rule "Windows - Applocker - Enrichment 43"
stage 50 match all
rule "Windows - Applocker - Enrichment 51"
rule "Windows - Applocker - Enrichment 52"
stage 10 match either
rule "Windows - Applocker - Routing 11"
rule "Windows - Applocker - Routing 12"
rule "Windows - Applocker - NXLog - Field Cleanup 13"
end

description.@value: Set Field "appcat" for 8002 - 8007, 8020 - 8025 from "my-applicationwhitelist" based on "appid"

source.@value:
rule "Windows - Applocker - NXLog - Field Cleanup 13"

when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker"

then
    remove_field("full_message");
    
end

description.@value: Removing from Stream "Illuminate:Windows Event Log Messages" identified by Stream ID

source.@value:
rule "Windows - Applocker - Routing 12"

when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker" OR
    to_string($message.winlogbeat_event_provider) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker"

then
    remove_from_stream(
        id: "642a9944b487b336a83e66f6"
    );
    
end

description.@value: Set Field "appid" for logs containing "apppath" from sha256 calculation

source.@value:
rule "Windows - Applocker - Enrichment 43"

when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker" AND
    has_field("apppath")

then
    set_field(
        field:"appid",
        value: sha256(to_string($message.apppath))
    );
    
end

rule "Windows - Applocker - Parsing 38"
when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker" AND
    (
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8004 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8007 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8022 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8025
    ) 
    
then
    set_field(
        field: "appaction",
        value: "block"
    );
    
end

description.@value: Renaming Fields "Domain", "EventID", "AccountName", "AccountType", "UserID"; Resetting Field, replacing "source" with "collector_node_id"

source.@value:
rule "Windows - Applocker - Parsing 37"
when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker" AND
    (
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8003 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8006 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8021 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8024
    ) 
    
then
    set_field(
        field: "appaction",
        value: "warn"
    );
    
end

description.@value: Routing to Stream "Windows - Applocker" identified by Stream ID

source.@value:
rule "Windows - Applocker - Routing 11"

when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker" OR
    to_string($message.winlogbeat_event_provider) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker"

then
    route_to_stream(
        id: "643d075d6f5dab51662c827e"
    );
    
end

description.@value: Applocker EventID 8020 - 8025 ; Fields: apppath, appbase, appname, appextension
Applocker EventID 8002 - 8007 ; Fields: apppath, appbase, appname, appextension

source.@value:
rule "Windows - Applocker - Parsing 36"
when
    to_string($message.SourceName) == "Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker" AND
    (
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8002 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8005 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8020 OR
        to_long($message.event_code) == 8023
    ) 
    
then
    set_field(
        field: "appaction",
        value: "allow"
    );
    
end

default_template.@value:
# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["graylog.demo.io:5044"]
path:
  data: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"C:\\Program Files\\Graylog\\sidecar\\cache\\winlogbeat"}\data
  logs: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"C:\\Program Files\\Graylog\\sidecar"}\logs
tags:
 - windows
winlogbeat:
  event_logs:
   - name: Application
   - name: System
   - name: Security

define ROOT C:\Program Files\Nxlog

Moduledir %ROOT%\modules
CacheDir %ROOT%\data
Pidfile %ROOT%\data\nxlog.pid
SpoolDir %ROOT%\data
LogFile %ROOT%\data\nxlog.log
LogLevel INFO

<Extension logrotate>
    Module  xm_fileop
    <Schedule>
        When    @daily
        Exec    file_cycle('%ROOT%\data\nxlog.log', 7);
     </Schedule>
</Extension>


<Extension gelfExt>
  Module xm_gelf
  # Avoid truncation of the short_message field to 64 characters.
  ShortMessageLength 65536
</Extension>

<Input eventlog>
        Module im_msvistalog
        PollInterval 1
        SavePos True
        ReadFromLast True
        
        #Channel System
        #<QueryXML>
        #  <QueryList>
        #   <Query Id='1'>
        #    <Select Path='Security'>*[System/Level=4]</Select>
        #    </Query>
        #  </QueryList>
        #</QueryXML>
</Input>


<Input file>
	Module im_file
	File 'C:\Windows\MyLogDir\\*.log'
	PollInterval 1
	SavePos	True
	ReadFromLast True
	Recursive False
	RenameCheck False
	Exec $FileName = file_name(); # Send file name with each message
</Input>


<Output gelf>
	Module om_tcp
	Host graylog.demo.io
	Port 12201
	OutputType  GELF_TCP
	<Exec>
	  # These fields are needed for Graylog
	  $gl2_source_collector = '${sidecar.nodeId}';
	  $collector_node_id = '${sidecar.nodeName}';
	</Exec>
</Output>


<Route route-1>
  Path eventlog => gelf
</Route>
<Route route-2>
  Path file => gelf
</Route>

define ROOT C:\Program Files\Nxlog

Moduledir %ROOT%\modules
CacheDir %ROOT%\data
Pidfile %ROOT%\data\nxlog.pid
SpoolDir %ROOT%\data
LogFile %ROOT%\data\nxlog.log
LogLevel INFO

<Extension logrotate>

    <Schedule>
        When    @daily
        Exec    file_cycle('%ROOT%\data\nxlog.log', 7);
     </Schedule>
</Extension>

  # Avoid truncation of the short_message field to 64 characters.
  ShortMessageLength 65536
</Extension>

<Input eventlog>

        PollInterval 1
        SavePos True
        ReadFromLast True
        
        #Channel System
        #<QueryXML>
        #  <QueryList>
        #   <Query Id='1'>
        #    <Select Path='Security'>*[System/Level=4]</Select>
        #    </Query>
        #  </QueryList>
        #</QueryXML>
</Input>


<Input file>
	Module im_file
	File 'C:\Windows\MyLogDir\\*.log'
	PollInterval 1
	SavePos	True
	ReadFromLast True
	Recursive False
	RenameCheck False
	Exec $FileName = file_name(); # Send file name with each message
</Input>


<Output gelf>
	Module om_tcp
	Host graylog.demo.io
	Port 12201
	OutputType  GELF_TCP
	<Exec>
	  # These fields are needed for Graylog
	  $gl2_source_collector = '${sidecar.nodeId}';
	  $collector_node_id = '${sidecar.nodeName}';
	</Exec>
</Output>


<Route route-1>
  Path eventlog => gelf
</Route>
<Route route-2>
  Path file => gelf
</Route>

# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["graylog.demo.io:5044"]
path:
  data: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"C:\\Program Files\\Graylog\\sidecar\\cache\\winlogbeat"}\data
  logs: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"C:\\Program Files\\Graylog\\sidecar"}\logs

winlogbeat:

template.@value:
define ROOT C:\Program Files\Nxlog

Moduledir %ROOT%\modules
CacheDir %ROOT%\data
Pidfile %ROOT%\data\nxlog.pid
SpoolDir %ROOT%\data
LogFile %ROOT%\data\nxlog.log
LogLevel INFO

<Extension logrotate>
    Module  xm_fileop
    <Schedule>
        When    @daily
        Exec    file_cycle('%ROOT%\data\nxlog.log', 7);
     </Schedule>
</Extension>


<Extension gelfExt>
  Module xm_gelf
  ShortMessageLength 65536
</Extension>

<Input eventlog>
    Module im_msvistalog
    PollInterval 1
    SavePos True
    ReadFromLast True

    <QueryXML>
        <QueryList>
          <Query Id="0">
             <Select Path="Security">*</Select>
             <Select Path="System">*</Select>
             <Select Path="Application">*</Select>
          </Query>
          <Query Id="1">
            <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL">*</Select>
            <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/MSI and Script">*</Select>
            <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Deployment">*</Select>
            <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Execution">*</Select>
          </Query>
          <Query Id="2">
             <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational">*</Select>
          </Query>
        </QueryList>
    </QueryXML>
</Input>


<Input file>
	Module im_file
	File 'C:\Program Files\Graylog\sidecar\logs\sidecar.log'
	PollInterval 1
	SavePos	True
	ReadFromLast True
	Recursive False
	RenameCheck False
	Exec $FileName = file_name();
</Input>


<Output gelf>
	Module om_tcp
	Host graylog.demo.io
	Port 12201
	OutputType  GELF_TCP
	<Exec>
	  # These fields are needed for Graylog
	  $gl2_source_collector = '${sidecar.nodeId}';
	  $collector_node_id = '${sidecar.nodeName}';
	</Exec>
</Output>


<Route route-1>
  Path eventlog => gelf
</Route>
<Route route-2>
  Path file => gelf
</Route>

# Needed for Graylog
fields_under_root: true
fields.collector_node_id: ${sidecar.nodeName}
fields.gl2_source_collector: ${sidecar.nodeId}

output.logstash:
   hosts: ["graylog.demo.io:5044"]
path:
  data: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"C:\\Program Files\\Graylog\\sidecar\\cache\\winlogbeat"}\data
  logs: ${sidecar.spoolDir!"C:\\Program Files\\Graylog\\sidecar"}\logs
tags:
 - windows
 - applocker
winlogbeat:
  event_logs:
   # Windows General Logging
   - name: Application
   - name: System
   - name: Security
   # Applocker Logging
   - name: Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL
   - name: Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/MSI and Script
   - name: Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Deployment
   - name: Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Execution
   # Powershell Logging
   - name: Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell/Operational

description.@value: Default Windows Event Log Messages. Contains all Windows Event Log messages not routed to other streams.
